items.sentence: I drove here from Boston as soon as I heard that you needed me.
I wish that I could explain to you how important this is to me.
Tom could feel the heat of the pizza through the cardboard box.
The box was crushed during transport and the contents flew out.
I know a woman whose first and last names are the same as mine.
I know it's highly unlikely anyone would be willing to help me.
I just want you to know I won't be able to come to your picnic.
I just want you to know I won't be able to attend your wedding.
Tom is pretty good at singing, but he's not a very good dancer.
Tom drank a Long Island iced tea and Mary drank a cosmopolitan.
